usage: Used for strength training, toning, aerobics, rehabilitation exercises, and general home or gym workouts.
key_features: Product variant includes 4 kg pack of 2 in grey
Neoprene coating with smooth, anti-slip finish for comfortable and secure grip
Hexagonal design prevents rolling and allows stable placement on surfaces
Suitable for strength training, toning, aerobics, rehabilitation, and home workouts
Durable construction resistant to wear and tear
Easy to wipe clean after use
Hexagon-shaped edges for easy storage and to prevent rolling
ai_description: A pair of compact grey hexagonal dumbbells with a clean, studio finish. Each weight clearly shows “4KG” in white on the end. The solid, flat-sided design keeps them from rolling, while the textured neoprene-style coating gives a smooth, grippy surface suited to home or gym use.
target_audience: Home and gym users at any fitness level looking for compact, fixed-weight dumbbells for exercise and strength training.
product_name: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells Sets for Gym Exercise
